channel.title: Why are there so many ppl on irc? and what is the update on "bot nuking day"?
channel.description:
I am not well informed on any of this shit anymore. :(
Did everyone get cancer from the radiation of the bot nuke or is Jagex just fucking retarded? What did they do to their client to try and 'nuke' bots? 9999 questions...

item.title: Why are there so many ppl on irc? and what is the update on "bot nuking day"?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Phillipé, post:3, topic:419602”]I heard there are so many people on IRC because they are looking for shit to put on reddit and other sites that they think will make them look smart in relation to this nuke bollocks.

man. shits weak.[/quote]
we r famous

Read full topic
item.source: Why are there so many ppl on irc? and what is the update on "bot nuking day"?
